text: The Bath of Shah Rukn al-Din dates back to the Safavid period and is located in Dezful, Shah district of Rokn al-Din, and this record was registered as a national monument of Iran on May 9, 1382 with the registration number 8379. == Restoration and transformation of the bathroom into the library == In 2006, Shamsi was quoted as saying by the IRNA media that the bath of Rokn al-Din Shah is being repaired. Gholam Ali Baghban, director of the cultural heritage of Dezful, announced that measures such as water and sewage network reform, the redevelopment of electricity grids and redevelopment are ongoing, and after a long time the reconstruction of the place has become a cafe and library. == Gallery == File:حوض مرمت شده حمام شاه رکن الدین عکس از حسین درآمد.jpg|Refurbished dock photo bath of shah rukn al-din Photo by Hossein Daramad File:نمایی از طبقه پایین حمام شاه رکن الدین عکس از حسین درآمد.jpg|Picture of a downstairs and a teenager's bookcase the Bath of Shah Rokn al-Din Photo by Hossein Daramad File:سالن مطالعه طبقه پایین حمام شاه رکن الدین عکس از حسین درآمد.jpg|Picture of downstairs study hall the Bath of Shah Rokn al-Din Photo by Hossein Daramad File:نمای داخلی حمام شاه رکن الدین عکس از حسین درآمد.jpg|Picture of the interior the Bath of Shah Rokn al-Din Photo by Hossein Daramad File:بخش کافی نت حمام شاه رکن الدین در سال 2007.jpg|Picture of the 2007 cafe section bath of shah rukn al-din the lower floor of the study hall File:تصویری از حوض حمام شاه رکن الدین قبل از ترمیم کامل.jpg|An image of the bath of shah rukn al-din in 2007 before full restoration File:بخش مدیریت حمام شاه رکن الدین قبل از مرمت سازی کامل در سال 2007.jpg|An image of the King Rikn al-Din Bathroom Management section before complete restoration in 2007 == See also == * Cultural Heritage, Handicrafts and Tourism Organization of Iran *Importance and place of shrine King Rok Al-Din' mausoleum in the old texture of Dezful city == References == Category:National Works of Iran Category:Public libraries __INDEX__
